recipe.title: Salt-Baked Potatoes
instructions: Put oven rack in middle position and preheat oven to 425°F. Prick potatoes in several places with a fork. Coat each potato with egg white, then crust potatoes completely in salt. Bake potatoes in a shallow baking pan until tender when pierced with a sharp knife, about 1 hour. Crack off as much salt as desired from skin before serving.
